languages.text: {n}Вы заслушиваетесь очередной мелодией и забываете следить за происходящем на поле.{/n}
{n}The next tune is so catchy that you completely forget about what is happening on the board.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La mélodie suivante est tellement entraînante que vous en oubliez ce qui se passe sur le plateau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La siguiente melodía es tan pegadiza que te olvidas completamente de lo que sucede sobre el tablero.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The next tune is so catchy that you completely forget about what is happening on the board.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La siguiente melodía es tan pegadiza que te olvidas completamente de lo que sucede sobre el tablero.{/n}

languages.text: {n}次の曲はとてもキャッチーで、盤上でのアレコレをすっかり忘れてしまった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The next tune is so catchy that you completely forget about what is happening on the board.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}次の曲はとてもキャッチーで、盤上でのアレコレをすっかり忘れてしまった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}笛声是如此引人注意。你欣赏着笛声，完全忘记了游戏板上发生了什么事情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The next tune is so catchy that you completely forget about what is happening on the board.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}笛声是如此引人注意。你欣赏着笛声，完全忘记了游戏板上发生了什么事情。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das nächste Lied ist so eingängig, dass du völlig vergisst, was sich auf dem Brett abspielt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir sonraki melodi o kadar dile dolanıyor ki oyun tahtasında neler olduğunu tamamen unutuyorsun.{/n}
